PTeamCreateModal.contactInfoPlaceholder: Max length is {{maxHalf}} in half-width or {{maxFull}} in full-width

PTeamCreateModal.teamNameTooLong: Too long team name. Max length is {{maxHalf}} in half-width or {{maxFull}} in full-width
PTeamCreateModal.contactInfoTooLong: Too long contact info. Max length is {{maxHalf}} in half-width or {{maxFull}} in full-width

DeleteAccountDialog.title: Delete your account permanently?
DeleteAccountDialog.warning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account.
DeleteAccountDialog.confirmPrompt: Type in your email to confirm

AccountSettingsDialog.yearsOfExperience: Years of work experience in security
AccountSettingsDialog.yearsTooltip: Please select years of your work experience in security to support security response.
AccountSettingsDialog.defaultTeamTooltip: Your default team. This will be shown if no other team is currently selected.

TwoFactorAuthSection.title: Two-factor Authentication
TwoFactorAuthSection.disabled: Protect your account with SMS verification.

MfaSetupDialog.enterPhoneNumber: Please enter your mobile phone number to enable 2FA
MfaSetupDialog.codeSentTo: We sent a 6-digit verification code to <0>{{countryCode}}</0> <1>{{phoneNumber}}</1>
MfaSetupDialog.codeResent: The verification code has been resent.

DisabledMfaConfirmDialog.title: Disable SMS Authentication for phone number {{phoneNumber}}?
DisabledMfaConfirmDialog.warning: By disabling SMS Authentication, your account will be only protected by your password.
DisabledMfaConfirmDialog.note: Note: To change your phone number, disable SMS Authentication first and then set it up again.
